117//*****************************************************************************
118//
119// !Write flush - This function will hold the bus until all queued write
120// !operations have completed, thereby guaranteeing that all writes have
121// !been flushed.
122//
123//*****************************************************************************
124#define SYNC_READ 0x5FFF0000
125#define am_hal_sysctrl_bus_write_flush() AM_REGVAL(SYNC_READ)
